name: Nigerian Jolloff & Co.
description: Experience Jollof in all its splendor! From the beloved smokey jollof rice to pasta, Asaro and much more we promise you a lunch full of relish! Exclusively on FoodCourt.
description_long: Experience Jollof in all its splendor! From the beloved smokey jollof rice to pasta, Asaro and much more we promise you a lunch full of relish! Exclusively on FoodCourt.

name: Frankies
description: You’ll keep coming back for more after a first trial of the juiciest Burgers & Hotdogs in Lagos! You’ll never go wrong with this mouth-watering heavenly goodness! Exclusively on FoodCourt.
description_long: You’ll keep coming back for more after a first trial of the juiciest Burgers & Hotdogs in Lagos! You’ll never go wrong with this mouth-watering heavenly goodness! Exclusively on FoodCourt.

name: FC Shop
description: Shop your favorite drinks, snacks, ice cream as well as lifestyle essentials, and have them delivered to your doorstep!
description_long: Shop your favorite drinks, snacks, ice cream as well as lifestyle essentials, and have them delivered to your doorstep!

name: Wrapped City
description: Experience the widest range of Shawarma flavors here. Spiced up, juicy and well seasoned - just how you like it! Exclusively on FoodCourt..
description_long: Experience the widest range of Shawarma flavors here. Spiced up, juicy and well seasoned - just how you like it! Exclusively on FoodCourt.

name: Sunny Side Club
description: Treat yourself each day to a morning of bliss with any of our simply delectable toast, waffles, pancakes, sandwiches, and more! Exclusively on FoodCourt
description_long: Treat yourself each day to a morning of bliss with any of our simply delectable toast, waffles, pancakes, sandwiches, and more! Exclusively on FoodCourt

name: Sweet Treats
description: Sweet tooth? Say no more! Satisfy those cravings with flavorsome treats of french toast, waffles, pancakes and crepes dazzled with your favorite fruit and syrup toppings! Exclusively on FoodCourt.
